message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep, but I was really hoping to get closer to the value I had in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit far apart. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'll meet you at $155, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I understand you're trying to find a fair price, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $135 for it.
I'm starting to feel like we're getting closer, but I still need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $145, but I'm not sure how much lower I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but $145 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.
